content: nottawasaga buff bylucillemaierhofer difficulty easy skills needed include knit purl slip slip knit and knit two together materials 90 yrds worsted yarn 5 5mm circular needles gauge 18st by 26rs = 4in by 4in size laying flat 13 5 by 9 5in = cuff to point by edge to edge to adjust the size i suggest knitting with larger/smaller needles and following the same stitch count abbreviations k= knit p= purl ssk= slip slip knit k2tog= knit two together pattern cast on 88 stitches and split evenly on circular needles use the magic loop method to continue working in the round cuff r1-6 *k1 p1* repeat ** to end neck r1-32 knit to end r33-38 *k1 p1* repeat ** 21 more times or halfway across there should be a total of 44 stitches worked in this pattern k44 chest r1 bind off 44 stitches only the ribbed stitches k44 r2 sl1 k5 purl to 6 stitches left k6 r3 sl1 k5 ssk knit to 8 stitches left k2tog k6 repeat r2 for all even row and r3 for all odd row until there are 14 stitches left on your needles 6 rib/garter st 2 knit and another 6 rib and evening on an even purling row r1 sl1 k4 k2tog ssk k5 r2 sl1 k4 p2 k5 r3 sl1 k3 k2tog ssk k4 r4 sl1 k3 p2 k4 r5 sl1 k2 k2tog ssk k3 r6 sl1 k2 p2 k3 r7 sl1 k1 k2tog ssk k2 r8 sl1 k1 p2 k2 r9 sl1 k2tog ssk k1 r10 sl1 p2 k1 r11 k2tog ssk r12 sl1 k1 bind off and finish
